data.comment: Liege kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Laurent Jans is booked for the home team.
In the minute 13, The home team replace Obbi Oulare with Felipe Avenatti.
Goal! Mouscron have got their heads in front thanks to a Bruno Xadas strike.
Deni Hocko (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Nicolas Laforge blows to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Liege - Mouscron with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Duje Cop with Mehdi Carcela-González. This is the second substitution made today by Philippe Montanier.
In the minute 63, Beni Badibanga is replacing Fabrice Olinga for Mouscron at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
Serge Tabekou is replacing Imad Faraj for the away team.
Merveille Bokadi (Liege) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 77, Selim Amallah for Liege has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
Liege make their third substitution with Michel Ange Balikwisha replacing Noe Dussenne.
Mehdi Carcela-González (Liege) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Darly Nlandu is on a sub for Bruno Xadas for Mouscron.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
